occupation: Interim Executive Management, CFO/COO/CRO/CEO at Brykwall Advisory Services Ltd.
headline: Interim and Fractional Executive Management (CFO/COO/CEO)
summary:
Over 30 years‚Äô experience as COO/CFO in industry and as an advisor helping companies in transition. Lead roles in finance, operations, M&A, restructuring and performance improvement. Recognized for a relentless focus on the core strategic goals and stakeholder management to drive team confidence and success.   As COO/CFO for a CPG market leader, managed the massive market impacts of Covid, supply chain disruptions and inflation all while raising capital and successfully implementing a new ERP. Knowledge of product costing and pricing across all lines including Walmart, Amazon, Costco, and D2C ecommerce.   

Experience with financing and M&A transaction processes, business valuations and corporate finance on all sides of the deal.  Extensive international experience - automotive plants in Italy and UK, mining and steel in Mexico, Canadian and US manufacturing and CPG - I am able to manage differing cultural, operational and regulatory requirements across regions and corporate cultures. 

A thought-leader, I am co-author of the book, ‚ÄúThe Purchase and Sale of Privately Held Businesses‚Äù and was a frequent speaker and writer and has been published in Canada, the United States and Mexico.

I am currently the Board President at the Tarragon Theatre, Canada‚Äôs neighbourhood theatre company.   Come see a show!

experiences.description: Advisor to the owners, vendors, and purchasers of privately held companies in Canada.

experiences.title: Senior Advisor (formerly COO & CFO)
experiences.description: We are the North American leader in soft side coolers and insulated products including the Arctic Zone, Titan and Columbia brands.

experiences.title: Partner, Restructuring and Working Capital
Partner, Restructuring Leader Mexico
experiences.description:
Leading the Mexico RS practice I established a core restructuring practice and brought best practices to Mexico financial advisory and successfully built relationships across the legal and finance community in Mexico and Latin America to grow the business.  

Provided restructuring advisory services to organizations across Mexico and Latin America including in the steel, oil and gas and shipping industries.

experiences.title: Associate Partner, M&A, FInancial Advisory
experiences.description:
- Led a strategic change process with CEO of a major entertainment distribution Company addressing capital issues thorough refinancing and taking company public based on new strategic direction, completed acquisitions to drive strategic change from hard goods distribution to content development and ownership

- Acted as interim Chief Credit Officer overseeing $750M portfolio of oil and gas accounts receivable across 5 divisions and 20k+ accounts. Updated processes and procedures, built and installed new credit risk model to reflect strategic goals of Company

experiences.title: Restructuring and M&A
experiences.description:
As a lead member of Kroll‚Äôs internal M&A team performed operational and financial due diligence on Kroll acquisitions valued up to US$150M.  With the executive team developed strategic plans for the Company.  During this period Kroll, a leading international risk consulting firm, grew from approximately US$150 million in revenues to US$800 million.  

Concurrently dedicated to the Canadian and international corporate turnaround practice I played lead roles on significant files in both the UK, Italy, the United States and Canada.

volunteer_work.title: President of the Board of Directors
volunteer_work.description: President of the Board - Tarragon Theatre‚Äôs mission is to create, develop and produce new Canadian plays and to provide the conditions for new work to thrive. To that end, the theatre engages the best theatre artists and craftspeople to interpret new work; presents each new work with high quality production values; provides an administrative structure to support new work; develops marketing strategies to promote new work; and continually generates an audience for new work.
